N o t e s: Populations from Turkey are commonly attributed to the subspecies T. s. suturalis REITTER, 1913, a phenotype which is however found mixed with the typical form in all South-Eastern Europe ( BARAUD 1992 ; TAUZIN & RITTNER 2012).
